user_query: I'm planning to organize a coding competition for my company's employees. Can you suggest some challenging coding problems suitable for experienced programmers? Also, provide me with the details of Chapter 20 from the Bhagavad Gita and the verse number 12 from that chapter.

TaskList.description: Research and compile a list of challenging coding problems suitable for experienced programmers.
Retrieve details of Chapter 20 from the Bhagavad Gita.
Extract verse number 12 from Chapter 20 of the Bhagavad Gita.
